OOC:  Ok.  But by the way,  it's Skulletron, without an "r".  :)
  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: cardhead649 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 1:37 PM
  Subject: Re: Empath/Galvatron


 =
 <Very well, my lord.> Empath betrays some disappointment through her 
  me=
ntal voice.  (It's a habit of hers not to use her comm under normal 
  circ=
umstances; telepathy is much more difficult to eavesdrop on.)

  The Seeker=
 increases her speed to maximum and soon reaches 
  headquarters.  If it's =
that important, then she has no wish to 
  delay.  Still, the whispering vo=
ices remain at the back of her mind, 
  and that bothers her.  If there is =
indeed someone on this world with 
  that kind of power, it is of grave con=
cern to everyone involved.

  Changing to robot mode, she walks inside, won=
dering what her 
  unpredictable commander was up to now.

  (OOC: Lurker, =
before you get any ideas, this has nothing to do with 
  Skullertron.  Her =
mental powers are every bit as potent and refined 
  as his, and she could =
block out his influence at will.)

  --- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... w=
rote:
  >  Galvatron was startled by the entrance of his mind. "No there is=
 
  no time for 
  > that now. We will investigate it later."


        Yah=
oo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT
             
       

  Yo=
ur use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
